content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1-5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- 3 stone furnaces at positions (1,1), (3,1), and (5,1)
- 3 burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5), (3.5,2.5), and (5.5,2.5)
- 3 wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5), (3.5,3.5), and (5.5,3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- 2 stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- 2 burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- 2 wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Setup (x=11.5-21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Consists of:
- Copper cable assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)
- Electronic circuit assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)
- Input chest for copper plates at (14.5,11.5)
- Output chest for copper cables at (11.5,14.5)
- Input chest for electronic circuits at (21.5,12.5)
- Output chest for electronic circuits at (21.5,11.5)
- Multiple burner inserters connecting these components at positions (14.5,12.5), (12.5,14.5), and (21.5,13.5)

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5-13.5, y=26.5-35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Pipe network connecting these components
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Before placing entities, check if the target position is already occupied by another entity
- When placing inserters next to buildings, ensure proper spacing and direction parameters
- Consider using different spacing values when the default spacing results in conflicts

### Fluid System Issues
- One offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) is not connected to any fluid system
- Ensure all fluid-carrying entities are properly connected via pipes

### Production Line Efficiency
- The copper cable assembler has output blocking issues - ensure proper item flow with working inserters
- The electronic circuit assembler shows resource shortages - ensure consistent supply of both iron plates and copper cables

### Power Distribution
- Ensure electric poles are properly connected to form a continuous network for power distribution
- Keep track of power consumption and generation capacity
